ModMetaData.name: Blocky Core
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: Blocky Core This mod provides shared textures and functions for other Blocky mods. Also adds 100+ props from the Minecraft. "Blocky Props" architect menu is visible only in dev.mode by default, configurable in mod's settings. https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-BlockyCore Support me https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 or https://www.patreon.com/zed_0xff
